oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cabinet card of Civil War veteran Rufus B. Parkes (Parks)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Post-war cabinet card of Lt. Rufus B. Parkes, Co. E, 9th KY, Inf. Regt., CSA. Parkes was from Lincoln County (Tenn." now Moore County (Tenn." Parkes lost his diary at Shiloh and it was returned to his family in 1925. Company E was apparently recruited in Tenn. and after Shiloh, became Co. A, 23rd Tenn. Inf. Regt, CSA. Parkes was discharged May 17, 1862. The cabinet card was from Staley Bros., Tullahoma, Coffee County (Tenn."
